entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then periods of light snow. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
